description:
2041 Dickinson St. Available June
Come out today and take a look at this beautiful three bedroom one bathroom house in the point breeze section of Philadelphia.
One step inside this house and you’re sure to fall in love.
As you enter the home you walk right into the living room with refinished hardwood floors. This room is large enough to have a living room and a full separate dining room with table and chairs. The kitchen is extremely efficient with all wood cabinets, a full-size refrigerator, and gas stove. Through the kitchen you can access the rear patio which has a small little space to plant flowers and or vegetables.
There is a full basement that is extremely clean and very dry. This basement is perfect for storage however there is also a full-size washer and dryer located there as well.
The second floor of this home has three incredibly spacious bedrooms and one three-piece tiled bathroom. All bedrooms have tall ceilings, wall to wall carpet, and great natural light. The bathroom is a three-piece tile bath with full-size tub.
All windows are double pane vinyl windows which leave cool in the summer and warm in the winter. This house is not to be missed.

title: Stroll down one of the prettiest tree-lined blocks of Pine Street
description: Stroll down one of the prettiest tree-lined blocks of Pine Street to your new condo in Garden Court. Enter through the secured gate and step into a tranquil courtyard with koi pond and lush landscaping. Unit C103 is a front corner one-bedroom flat with your own private entrance. Inside you will find the perfect blend of charming details and modern updates. Original wood floors, gorgeous re-leaded glass windows, hand-stripped wood door with crystal knobs, tasteful paint colors, and the all-white kitchen provide a blank slate for the next owner. The large main living space is bright and open with plenty of space for living, dining, and cooking. The kitchen features new cabinets, quartz counters, and appliances. Tucked off the kitchen is a utility/laundry closet with a washer/dryer combo unit. The bedroom is very large and has a surprisingly large walk-in closet. The black and white bath tile bath is updated while retaining its original character. One window A/C cools the whole apartment with the help of two modern ceiling fans. You won't mind working from home in this professionally managed building that includes a gorgeous indoor, heated art deco pool with Moravian tile, library, community room, gym, locker room, and updated elevators. Plenty of nearby options for takeout and shopping. title: Introducing South Philly’s best-kept and most affordable secret: 1028
description: Introducing South Philly’s best-kept and most affordable secret: 1028 Salter Street! This classic brick trinity is tucked away on a secluded no-parking block in the heart of the wonderful Bella Vista neighborhood. The block is so quiet, you’ll forget you’re in the city at all! Enter into the cozy living room, where the showpiece is the exposed brick wall with wood-burning fireplace and wood mantle. The kitchen beyond has everything you need including decent counter space and even a dishwasher, and a sliding door leads out to a patio with enough space for a grill and seating. The second floor has a bedroom with closet and bathroom, and the third floor is a light-filled room that could be used as a 2nd bedroom, office, or studio. Perhaps the best surprise of all is this room features a sliding glass door and walk-out roof—just put up a railing and you’ve got yourself a roof deck! The basement is dry with a sump pump—a great space for storage. Some other highlights of this home include central air, a brand new rubber roof with 15-year warranty, and a newer water heater.

title: Room for Rent - May 1 or earlier move in
description:
AVAILABLE MAY 1 OR EARLIER.
Cozy basement bedroom + bathroom available for rent in Southwest Philly! $650 + ~$100 utilities (internet, water, gas, and electric)
First month's, last month's and security deposit ($1950)
About the roomies:
Two professionals in their mid-20s and their Tuxedo cat currently living in the home. They’ve  lived in this home for about 1.5 years and love it! I recently got a new job in a different state so we’re are looking to fill my spot.
Sandy (she/her) works in real estate and primarily WFH. She is a Philly native and is happy to guide you to the best food places in Philly. In her free time, she watches anime, plays video games, exercises and does pet sitting as a side gig. She is a big foodieHer tuxedo cat, named Kalianne, has been with her for 7 years and is a super sweet cat.
Taylor (she/her) works as a middle-school teacher and does part-time content work with an EdTech startup. She grew up in the Delco suburbs outside of Philly, and has enjoyed her time living in the city, especially here in Southwest! In her free time, Taylor enjoys watching a variety of different tv shows, reading, attending yoga or barre classes, and trying new places to eat. Taylor’s family has a 3 year-old pit terrier rescue named Lil Boy who occasionally comes to visit as well.
About You:
A professional adult who is clean, tidy, responsible and likes cats. COVID-vaccinated and boosted. No other pets please! Small gatherings are okay, but please no OVERLY regular visitors staying overnight. Prioritizing femme or NB POC folks.
About the Home:
Small street off of a busy street. Everyone around is friendly, and are long-time residents. The home is a 4 bed, 2 bath home. We love the home and the landlord is incredibly responsive. Repairs are always made quickly. We also get a monthly deep-cleaning service (~$70 per person). The home is fully furnished, but we are happy to adjust and add anything you would like to add.
Perks
- Garage for storage and deck above
- Laundry & dishwasher at home
- Close to grocery stores such as Acme and Shoprite (aldi opening soon!)
Transportation
- Parking is not the easiest fyi
- 10 minute walk from the subway
- The 2, 7, and 17 buses are also closeby & make it easy to get into the city
- 10 min drive from the airport
About the Room:
This is a basement bedroom with its own bathroom. Although kind of small, we've been able to comfortably fit a full/queen bed, side tables, clothes rack, dresser AND desk. We also have a mount on the wall if you want to put your own TV up. The bathroom is small but it is perfect for one person and won't be shared with anyone. You're also free to decorate the space outside of the bedroom.
